original_text: When the famine had spread over the whole country, Joseph opened all the storehouses and sold grain to the Egyptians, for the famine was severe throughout Egypt.
korean_text: 온 지면에 기근이 있으매 요셉이 모든 창고를 열고 애굽 백성에게 팔새 애굽 땅에 기근이 심하며

sentences.original_text: When the famine had spread over the whole country
and sold grain to the Egyptians
for the famine was severe throughout Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 기근이 온 이집트 땅에 심했기 때문이었다
